meanings.sent1: Winning the lottery was the flukiest thing that ever happened to me.
meanings.sent2: She found the flukiest four-leaf clover in the field.
meanings.sent3: It was the flukiest coincidence that we both wore the same shirt.
meanings.sent4: His flukiest guess turned out to be the correct answer.
meanings.sent5: The flukiest moment of the day was when the sun came out during the storm.

meanings.definition: Characterized by good luck or fortune.
meanings.sent1: Being in the right place at the right time was the flukiest part of his success.
meanings.sent2: She had the flukiest streak of wins at the casino.
meanings.sent3: The flukiest part of the day was when the boss gave everyone a bonus.
meanings.sent4: His flukiest charm seemed to bring him good luck wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The flukiest turn of events led to her finding her lost ring.
